idea:
H&UL is a manufacturing, marketing and distribution company of all kinds of lifestyle and wellness products. it will be a platform to promote, sell and distribute items across various categories related to human lifestyle that would include,

1. Beauty & Cosmetics Products

2. Ayurveda Products  

3. Healthcare & Nutraceutical Products

4. Clothing and Textile

5. Sports Wear & Equipment

6. Digital & Electronic Gadgets & Equipment

H&UL will also be engaged into social activity in promoting various programs with respect to fitness, education, sanitation, marathons etc. to underprivileged people/ serve the nation.
name: HIGH & UBER LIFESTYLE LLP

idea:
FOUNDER OF AASTHA CHANNELS WORLDWIDE NOWPresenting

ENRICH TV OTT PLATFORM

Dream of our Hon’ble Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modiji's Atma Nirbhar Digital India.

The Netflix of Coaching Mentoring and Motivation - A Marriage of EdTech + Streaming VOD OTT TOTAL INNOVATION DISRUPTION

Both are the largest and fastest growth sectors world-wide but more in India than anywhere else.

 The world is on PAUSE mode now, will have to press the ReBoot/ReSet Button.

Everyone will need and consume heavy digital online learning upskilling in the shrinking workspace.

Self-Education will supplement/replace conventional Academics.

ENRICH will aggregate, curate and create knowledge/Life transforming content, non-academic learning as never before.

ENRICH Business plan has 4 vertiacls :

1. A linear 24x7 live digital streaming web TV channel which will be on every device, carrying introductory, value adding knowledge-sharing for needs and desires of consumers.

2. Subscription Video on Demand platform offering a wide range of intermediate learning solutions to the pain points.

3. A Transaction based Video on Demand Section will offer advanced COURSES OF various LEARNING by Mentors and Coaches at affordable prices.

4. We are working with developers of various interactivity features, LMS, AI driven chat bots, clickable videos with live playing content.

The development of Learning Management Systems integrating web meetplaces like zoom, meets, teams, Namaste, teachable, bitclass will make it the best 'GoTo' place for any educationist or small and mid level EdTech orgs.

There are Millions of jobless as a consequence of COVID Lockdowns in India.

Target : a population of 1.38 Billion (17.7% of the world) of which 65% are under the age of 35 and 70 Million SMEs.

Scalability and Impact at National level : Dubbing in local and regional languages (core competency )

We aim to create the largest Repository of unique learning content and attain self-sustenance in 5 years.
name: ENRICHTV PVT LTD

idea: We endeavor to become recognized as the benchmark of outstanding service for all our esteemed clients , across all industries. We pride ourselves on bringing results that count in everything that we set out to do and we are constantly striving for successful outcomes in all areas of our business.
name: Modi Prinetrs

idea:
Praan builds filterless outdoor air purification systems for cities. These devices can be scaled from size of 5.5ft to 300ft and can be attached to streetlamps, sides of buildings, or placed on stands on campuses. 


Praan was founded by Angad Daryani out of his dorm room at the Georgia Institute of Technology in Atlanta, GA. On moving back to India in 2020, he registered the company here and has since been operating it. 


Praan has been part of the CREATE-X accelerator program at Georgia Tech and has also been recognized by Thiel Foundation backed Emergent Ventures at the Mercatus Center.
name: Praan Technologies Pvt Ltd

idea:
Qualified as EPGDIBS, IIFT, DELHI (2014)

Qualified as B.E. Computer Science, Mumbai (2007)

certified by Women Startup Program 3.0, IIM Bangalore (2020)

certified by Entrepreneurship Learning, Startup India Upgrad (2020)

worked as Senior Business Analyst, Accenture (2014-2016)

worked as Senior Business Consultant, Capgemini (2007-2012)

Independent Consultant(2017- August 2020)
name: Shrddha Shetty

idea:
KJ DOORSTEP DISTRIBUTORS LLP is having an online platform to provide doorstep delivery of fuel. When everything in the world is available online, we are coming with providing online home delivery of fuel. This will helps to generate the employment opportunity and creates the job opportunity.

 You can place your order online and get fuel delivered at your location in specialized Refuellers according to your chosen schedule. We are making refuelling smarter!Delivery is made possible with state of the art fuel refuelers (Bowsers) fitted with latest automation systems, app based fuel ordering based on your needs.

We are looking forward to make fueling easy for the uneasy.
name: KJ DOORSTEP DISTRIBUTORS LLP

idea: Modern Crew is a Direct to Consumer (D2C) brand that aims to greatly enhance men’s innerwear comfort with exclusive premium fabrics (Flagship Product: 90% micro-modal 10% spandex) and design innovations at an affordable price.
name: MODERN CREW LIFESTYLE SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Our mission is Reducing Environmental Impact (REI) by using ethically sourced raw materials, adopting efficient production methods, and promoting slow circular fashion through our e-commerce brand/store, while also creating sustainable livelihoods for women from underprivileged communities.
name: REISTORLIFE LLP

idea:
For any adult who wants affordable but high quality physiotherapy, Physica is a VR based physiotherapy telehealth product that allows patients to perform clinically standardized therapy remotely, at affordable prices.

Unlike regular physiotherapy, Physica allows patients to access high quality standardized care at a price 10x less.
name: Physica

idea: Bridge Inventions Private Limited (the start up/ we) aims to use its expertise and understanding in the automotive space to create practical and innovative solutions in transportation, vehicle designing and engineering.
name: Bridge Inventions Private Limited
